event_title: Fucking... Or What it Means to Live (Shio & Shoyu)

interactivity.requirements: Not Friday 20 Tsuneyo Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Caterpillar " Seen " Moe Fan Service " from Tsuneyo Tojo

progression.synopsis: Tsuneyo has been asking Uta about ways to look after her father, since Uta has experience with that sort of thing. Uta is surprised when Tsuneyo displays her knowledge of swearing , and tells Sensei that they ought to correct her, but Sensei says that it's too much fun. Tsuneyo picks up on it, however, and once Uta has left, Sensei gives her a partial explanation (telling her to ask Molly for the rest). Tsuneyo says that there are so many things she doesn't understand, and that she worries about the future when her father won't be there to explain things. Sensei points out that she has other people who will help her, and that it doesn't help to dwell on things that haven't happened yet. Before Sensei leaves, Tsuneyo thanks him for "nurturing" her.

event_references.event_default_name: Fucking... Or What it Means to Live (Shio & Shoyu)

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.13p2.
